Package nzilbb.ag

Interface GraphTransformer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Function<Graph,​Graph>, UnaryOperator<Graph>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IGraphTransformer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConventionTransformer, DefaultOffsetGenerator, Merger, Normalizer, OrthographyClumper, ParticipantRenamer, SimpleTokenizer, SpanningConventionTransformer, UtteranceParallelizer, Validator
    public interface GraphTransformer
extends UnaryOperator<Graph>
    Interface for transformer that transforms a Graph in some way. This might include tokenizers, valitors, and taggers.

    Note that it is valid (indeed, normal) for the Graph returned by apply(Graph) to be the same object as the one passed in.

    Author:
    Robert Fromont robert@fromont.net.nz
